itemLabel: Leonard Lyle, 1st Baron Lyle of Westbourne

wikipedia_page.main: Charles Ernest Leonard Lyle, 1st Baron Lyle of Westbourne (22 July 1882 – 6 March 1954) was a British industrialist and Conservative Party politician.

#REDIRECT Leonard Lyle, 1st Baron Lyle of Westbourne

Nancy Lyle was born in London on 26 February 1910 and received education at St. Felix School in Southwold. She learnt playing tennis from her father Leonard Lyle, 1st Baron Lyle of Westbourne, an industrialist and politician who had also competed at Wimbledon.
